Soaring Eagle wrote:
> Hello,
> 
> Please bear with me if this is an old oft answered question.
> 
> I have a void method which takes in a java.util.Collection parameter -
> filled with Strings, performs some validations and sets a private
> member that is also a collection - filled with
> javax.mail.InternetAddress. How do I test this setter method through
> JUnit?

Here's a more general question: how do you detect that those 
InternetAddress objects are set correctly? Once you answer that, you'll 
know how to write your test.
